New Records: The Atlanta Braves have 12 extra-inning wins, leading the big leagues.
Key Match Events: Sean Murphy’s ground ball with the bases loaded scored Eli White in the 11th inning.
Michael Harris II’s bunt single and Adam Duvall’s error tied the game.
George Springer had three hits for the Blue Jays.
Pre-Game Insights: The Braves' 12 extra-inning wins highlight their resilience.
Post-Match Reflections: Brian Snitker praised the team’s determination in a challenging game.
Sean Murphy noted the importance of the play’s timing.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Braves are tied with the Mets for the final NL wild card.
Others: The game was a makeup game.
Whit Merrifield and Ozzie Albies’ injuries were noted.
